ygData.subject: Re: wake up!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest that if you don t want to be asked for clarity every 2 to 60 seconds, go role, and show your guild, and share your power with your group.  If you ask
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest that if you don't want to be asked for clarity every 2 to 60 seconds, go role, and show your guild, and share your power with your group. If you ask for a group in a zone, go ahead and say Enchanter seeking group to hunt with and cast clarity on. Get's em every time =)

Just look forward to the days when you will be able to solo 6 spectres at a time. Whew that's a rush.


----- Original Message -----
From: Shane Bole
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 9:31 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] wake up!!


I agree that the list has died, but anyways I got a question for all you
enchanters out there...
I am halfway into 28, would have hit 29 but I am cautious and I like to play
around (all guards except highpass hate my 24 illusions... hehe).... How
often do people ask you for clarity? and how hard would it be to get a group
after achieving 29? and last.... do you recommend going /anon or /role?
Thanks in advance...

--
Fabno Licious, 28th Erudite Enchanter, EMarr
